navigators.smart.paxosatwar.executionmanager
Class ExecutionManager

java.lang.Object
  navigators.smart.paxosatwar.executionmanager.ExecutionManager

public final class ExecutionManager
extends java.lang.Object

This classe manages consensus instances. Each execution is a consensus instance. It can have several rounds if there were problems during consensus.

checkLimits

public final boolean checkLimits(PaxosMessage msg)
Checks if this message can execute now. If it is not possible, it is stored in outOfContextMessages

Parameters:
msg - the received message
Returns:
true in case the message can be executed, false otherwise

receivedOutOfContextPropose

public boolean receivedOutOfContextPropose(int eid)
Informs if there are messages till to be processed associated the specified consensus's execution

Parameters:
eid - The ID for the consensus execution in question
Returns:
True if there are still messages to be processed, false otherwise
